document_title: Stage 4 breast cancer: Symptoms, treatment and prognosis
subsection_name: ung-thu-vu-giai-doan-4.json_0_What is stage IV breast cancer?
subsection_content:
Stage IV breast cancer is also called metastatic breast cancer, meaning the breast cancer has spread to other parts of the body.
When cancer cells move through the bloodstream and/or lymph nodes to other parts of the body, it is called metastasis.
Breast cancer can spread to other parts of the body within months or years after diagnosis and treatment. Sometimes, breast cancer is discovered and diagnosed in a state that has metastasized to other parts of the body.
subsection_title: ung thu vu giai doan 4.json. What is stage IV breast cancer?
